title: Vladimir's "Tips" page on the client still tells you to buy DFG against him

replies.body: DFG confirmed to make a comeback in patch 5.6
Meanwhile Shyavna tips saying to buy Phage and Trinity for an AA slow
which is funny, because it'd be referring to the original DFG - the one that did like 50% (or more, scaling on AP) of your current HP.
It actually refers to the the current DFG that got removed few patches ago, because it refers to both DFG and Blade of the Ruined King, BotRK didn't exist until DFG got reworked for the 3rd time.
Oops! You're right! Thanks for the report!

If we're still talking about weird Tips, {{champion:112}} had a tip before his light rework that referred to "Gravity Field" as "Graviton Field". They've fixed it, but it was there for a very long time after his release, only being fixed after he was looked at a while back.
